title: Free Run Store
description: Free Run is an e-commerce store developed with a Ruby on Rails API back-end using JWT Authentication, RSpec for Test Driven Development and AWS S3 for image storage with Active Storage, and a React front-end using Hooks, React Router, Bulma CSS, Sass and PayPal checkout module.

title: Sustain WDN
description: SustainWDN is a platform made with a React frontend and a Rails API backend, the goal of the platform is to help youth find out and follow the pathways of their dreams, be assigned to a facilitator and apply to the opportunities they desire.

title: Kyoor MD
description: KyoorMD is a platform that specializes in health and wellness helping people with the COVID-19 pandemic, the website is developed using React, Bulma, Sass in the frontend and NodeJS aith PostgreSQL in the backend.

title: Tech Talks
description: A responsive mobile first full stack app made with the Test Driven Development techniques using: React/Redux, Ruby on Rails, Webpacker, Sass, Bootstrap, RSpec and Capybara.

title: Insta Social
description: A full CRUD social network app made using the TDD technique using RSpec and Capybara, Ruby on Rails, Sass, Bootstrap, PostgreSQL and Omniauth.

title: Battleship
description: The old school battleship game created with the TDD technique using Jest and vanilla JavaScript, ES6 modules, Webpack, Babel, HTML5 and CSS3.
